Posts.EditableText:
You are part of the engineering team working on a fantastic new transportation system.  Today was to be a straight-forward test involving transporting you from one side of the planet and back.  But, something has gone terribly wrong.

_**Pathway to Destruction**_

Genre : Mystery.  Quest 5.8, Parser

Please check out my first Quest game.

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/3w7kt1kxg02gcjq2wxmxlw/pathway-to-destruction
